course1.prereq: 3521 or 5521, and 2501 or Phil 1338, and CSE 3901 or 3902 or 3903, and 2nd writing; or grad standing.
course1.name: Capstone Design: Knowledge-Based Systems
course1.desc: Capstone design project; conceptual and technical design; theory and practice of knowledge-based systems; teamwork, written and oral communication skills.

course2.prereq: (CSE 3521 or CSE 5521) and (CSE 5522 or Stat 3460 or Stat 3470)
course2.name: Foundations of Speech and Language Processing
course2.desc: Fundamentals of natural language processing, automatic speech recognition and speech synthesis; lab projects concentrating on building systems to process written and/or spoken language.

course3.prereq: 2421, or 2451 and ECE 2560; and enrollment in CSE, CIS, Data Analytics, or ECE majors.
course3.name: Systems II: Introduction to Operating Systems
course3.desc: Introduction to operating system concepts: process, CPU scheduling, memory management, file system and storage, and multi-threaded programming.

course4.prereq: 1212, 1221, 1222, 1223, 1224, Engr 1221, 1281.01H, 1281.02H, or CSE Placement Level A. Prereq or concur: Math 1151, 1161.01, or 1161.02. Not open to students with credit for 5022.
course4.name: Software I: Software Components
course4.desc: Intellectual foundations of software engineering; design-by-contract principles; mathematical modeling of software functionality; component-based software from client perspective; layered data representation

course5.prereq: Prereq: 2221. Concur: 2321. Not open to students with credit for 2231.01.
course5.name: Software II: Software Development and Design
course5.desc: Data representation using hashing, search trees, and linked data structures; algorithms for sorting; using trees for language processing; component interface design; best practices in Java.

course6.prereq: 2122, 2123 or 2231; and 2321 or Math 2566; and enrollment in CSE, CIS, Data Analytics or Math majors
course6.name: Systems I: Introduction to Low-Level Programming and computer Organization
course6.desc: Introduction to computer architecture at machine and assembly language level; pointers and addressing; C programming at machine level; computer organization

course7.prereq: Prereq: 2122, 2123, or 2221; and Math 1151, or 1161. Concur (for students with credit for 2221): 2231.
course7.name: Foundations I: Discrete Structures
course7.desc: Propositional and first-order logic; basic proof techniques; graphs, trees; analysis of algorithms; asymptotic analysis; recurrence relations.

course8.prereq: Prereq: 2231, 2321, and Stat 3460 or 3470. Concur: Math 3345 and enrollment in CSE, CIS, ECE, Data Analytics, Math majors or CIS minor.
course8.name: Foundations II: Data Structures and Algorithms
course8.desc: Design/analysis of algorithms and data structures; divide-and-conquer; sorting and selection, search trees, hashing, graph algorithms, string matching; probabilistic analysis; randomized algorithms; NP-completeness.
